verbose_text: In conclusion, the present study confirmed the elevated expression level of FGF21/FGFR1/beta-Klotho in a mild ER stress model of rat cardiomyocytes, and that FGF21 exerted a cardio-protective role against ER stress induced cell apoptosis at least in part via activation of the FGFR1-ERK1/2 signaling pathway.
